message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob, but $18,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit below $15,000. How about we meet at $13,500?
Bob, I'm trying to make this work, but I can't go as low as $13,500.  My final offer is $14,250.  This is a great deal for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your efforts, but I'm still a bit below $14,250. How about we meet at $13,750?
